Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a symbol of excellence and quality. Considering its exceptional features and craftsmanship, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this unique opportunity, I am offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $125. I trust this price reflects the true value of the product and provides you with an excellent deal. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to enhance your experience with our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
